titles.title: Condemning the President's threat to shut down the United States-Mexico border to the detriment of the United States economy.
Condemning the President's threat to shut down the United States-Mexico border to the detriment of the United States economy.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
